channel.title: Hugo on Muscaestar's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Muscaestar's Blog

item.title: Use Emacs to Organize Hugo Blog
item.description: Emacs is a magical ‘software’ and you can do ‘everything’ in it, of course writing and organizing your blog posts. Last post, I built this blog with vanilla Hugo. This article will introduce org-mode and ox-hugo to make Hugo better for Emacs users.

item.title: Start a Multi Language Blog with Hugo on Github Pages
item.description:
Hugo is a handy framework for generating static website, which suits for normal blog. You can easily write blogs with various markdown languages and organize them with lots of features. This article will show you how I create this blog with it. I will focus on:

  1. Installation and Deployment
  2. Multi-Language Setting
